    82â†’class BaziAnalyzer:

    86â†’    å®ç°:
    87â†’    1. æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±è®¡ç®—ï¼ˆå¾—ä»¤/å¾—åœ°/å¾—åŠ¿/åˆå†²ï¼‰
    88â†’    2. ç”¨ç¥å–œå¿Œåˆ¤æ–­

    93â†’    def __init__(self):

   103â†’    def analyze(self, bazi_chart: Dict[str, Any]) -> BaziAnalysis:
   104â†’        """

   107â†’        Args:

   109â†’

   113â†’        # æå–åŸºç¡€æ•°æ®
   114â†’        day_master = self._get_day_master(bazi_chart)

   137â†’        return BaziAnalysis(

   149â†’    def _get_day_master(self, bazi_chart: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
   150â†’        """è·å–æ—¥ä¸»å¤©å¹²"""
   151â†’        default = self.bazi_config.defaults.day_master
   152â†’
   153â†’        # å°è¯•å¤šç§æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼
   154â†’        if "day_master" in bazi_chart:
   155â†’            dm = bazi_chart["day_master"]
   156â†’            if isinstance(dm, dict):
   157â†’                return dm.get("stem", default)
   158â†’            return dm
   159â†’
   160â†’        if "four_pillars" in bazi_chart:
   161â†’            day_pillar = bazi_chart["four_pillars"].get("day", {})
   162â†’            if isinstance(day_pillar, dict):
   163â†’                return day_pillar.get("stem", default)
   164â†’
   165â†’        return default

   167â†’    def _calculate_day_master_strength(
   168â†’        self,
   169â†’        day_master: str,
   170â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   171â†’    ) -> Tuple[str, float]:
   172â†’        """
   173â†’        è®¡ç®—æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±
   174â†’
   175â†’        åŸºäº:
   176â†’        1. å¾—ä»¤ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„å½±å“ï¼‰
   177â†’        2. å¾—åœ°ï¼ˆå››æ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼‰
   178â†’        3. å¾—åŠ¿ï¼ˆå¤©å¹²é€å‡ºçš„å¸®æ‰¶ï¼‰
   179â†’        4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£
   180â†’
   181â†’        Returns:
   182â†’            (å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§, å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•° -1.0 åˆ° 1.0)
   183â†’        """
   184â†’        score = 0.0
   185â†’        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
   186â†’            day_master,
   187â†’            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
   188â†’        )
   189â†’        weights = self.bazi_config.strength_weights
   190â†’
   191â†’        # 1. å¾—ä»¤åˆ¤æ–­
   192â†’        month_branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, "month")
   193â†’        seasonal_factor = self._calculate_seasonal_strength(dm_element, month_branch)
   194â†’        score += seasonal_factor * weights.seasonal
   195â†’
   196â†’        # 2. å¾—åœ°åˆ¤æ–­
   197â†’        root_factor = self._calculate_root_strength(day_master, four_pillars)
   198â†’        score += root_factor * weights.root
   199â†’
   200â†’        # 3. å¾—åŠ¿åˆ¤æ–­
   201â†’        support_factor = self._calculate_stem_support(day_master, four_pillars)
   202â†’        score += support_factor * weights.support
   203â†’
   204â†’        # 4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£
   205â†’        combination_factor = self._calculate_combination_effect(day_master, four_pillars)
   206â†’        score += combination_factor * weights.combination
   207â†’
   208â†’        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç­‰çº§ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®é˜ˆå€¼ï¼‰
   209â†’        thresholds = self.bazi_config.strength_thresholds
   210â†’        if score >= thresholds.extremely_strong:
   211â†’            return ("ææ—º", score)
   212â†’        elif score >= thresholds.strong:
   213â†’            return ("åæ—º", score)
   214â†’        elif score >= thresholds.balanced_lower:
   215â†’            return ("ä¸­å’Œ", score)
   216â†’        elif score >= thresholds.weak:
   217â†’            return ("åå¼±", score)
   218â†’        else:
   219â†’            return ("æå¼±", score)

   221â†’    def _calculate_seasonal_strength(self, dm_element: str, month_branch: str) -> float:
   222â†’        """
   223â†’        è®¡ç®—å¾—ä»¤å¼ºåº¦
   224â†’
   225â†’        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„å­£èŠ‚å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•°
   226â†’        """
   227â†’        if not month_branch:
   228â†’            return 0.0
   229â†’
   230â†’        season_element = self._mappings.month_branch_season.get(month_branch, "earth")
   231â†’        scores = self.bazi_config.seasonal_scores
   232â†’        element_generates = self._mappings.element_generates
   233â†’        element_controls = self._mappings.element_controls
   234â†’
   235â†’        # å½“ä»¤ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œä¸æ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œç›¸åŒï¼‰
   236â†’        if season_element == dm_element:
   237â†’            return scores.in_season
   238â†’
   239â†’        # ç›¸ç”Ÿï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œç”Ÿæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œï¼‰
   240â†’        if element_generates.get(season_element) == dm_element:
   241â†’            return scores.generated
   242â†’
   243â†’        # è¢«ç”Ÿï¼ˆæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œç”Ÿæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œï¼‰- æ³„æ°”
   244â†’        if element_generates.get(dm_element) == season_element:
   245â†’            return scores.drained
   246â†’
   247â†’        # è¢«å…‹ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œå…‹æ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œï¼‰
   248â†’        if element_controls.get(season_element) == dm_element:
   249â†’            return scores.controlled
   250â†’
   251â†’        # å…‹åˆ¶ï¼ˆæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œå…‹æœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œï¼‰- è€—æ°”
   252â†’        if element_controls.get(dm_element) == season_element:
   253â†’            return scores.controlling
   254â†’
   255â†’        return 0.0

   257â†’    def _calculate_root_strength(
   258â†’        self,
   259â†’        day_master: str,
   260â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   261â†’    ) -> float:
   262â†’        """
   263â†’        è®¡ç®—å¾—åœ°å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆå››æ”¯è—å¹²ä¸­çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼‰
   264â†’
   265â†’        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„æ ¹æ°”å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•°
   266â†’        """
   267â†’        score = 0.0
   268â†’        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
   269â†’            day_master,
   270â†’            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
   271â†’        )
   272â†’        root_scores = self.bazi_config.root_scores
   273â†’        element_generates = self._mappings.element_generates
   274â†’
   275â†’        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "day", "hour"]:
   276â†’            branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   277â†’            if not branch:
   278â†’                continue
   279â†’
   280â†’            hidden_stems = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch, [])
   281â†’            for i, hidden in enumerate(hidden_stems):
   282â†’                hidden_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(hidden, "")
   283â†’
   284â†’                # åŒäº”è¡Œä¸ºæ ¹
   285â†’                if hidden_element == dm_element:
   286â†’                    if i == 0:  # æœ¬æ°”
   287â†’                        score += root_scores.main_qi
   288â†’                    elif i == 1:  # ä¸­æ°”
   289â†’                        score += root_scores.middle_qi
   290â†’                    else:  # ä½™æ°”
   291â†’                        score += root_scores.residual_qi
   292â†’
   293â†’                # ç”Ÿæˆ‘è€…ä¹Ÿç®—å¼±æ ¹
   294â†’                elif element_generates.get(hidden_element) == dm_element:
   295â†’                    score += root_scores.indirect_support
   296â†’
   297â†’        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–åˆ° -1 åˆ° 1
   298â†’        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, (score - 1.0) / 2.0))
   299â†’
   300â†’    def _calculate_stem_support(
   301â†’        self,
   302â†’        day_master: str,
   303â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   304â†’    ) -> float:
   305â†’        """
   306â†’        è®¡ç®—å¾—åŠ¿å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆå¤©å¹²å¸®æ‰¶ï¼‰
   307â†’
   308â†’        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„å¤©å¹²å¸®æ‰¶åˆ†æ•°
   309â†’        """
   310â†’        score = 0.0
   311â†’        support_scores = self.bazi_config.stem_support_scores
   312â†’
   313â†’        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "hour"]:  # ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬æ—¥å¹²æœ¬èº«
   314â†’            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   315â†’            if not stem:
   316â†’                continue
   317â†’
   318â†’            ten_god = get_ten_god(day_master, stem, self._mappings)
   319â†’
   320â†’            if ten_god in ["æ¯”è‚©", "åŠ«è´¢"]:
   321â†’                score += support_scores.peer
   322â†’            elif ten_god in ["æ­£å°", "åå°"]:
   323â†’                score += support_scores.resource
   324â†’            elif ten_god in ["é£Ÿç¥", "ä¼¤å®˜"]:
   325â†’                score += support_scores.output
   326â†’            elif ten_god in ["æ­£è´¢", "åè´¢"]:
   327â†’                score += support_scores.wealth
   328â†’            elif ten_god in ["æ­£å®˜", "ä¸ƒæ€"]:
   329â†’                score += support_scores.power
   330â†’
   331â†’        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–
   332â†’        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, score / 1.5))

   334â†’    def _calculate_combination_effect(
   335â†’        self,
   336â†’        day_master: str,
   337â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   338â†’    ) -> float:
   339â†’        """
   340â†’        è®¡ç®—åˆå†²æ•ˆåº”
   341â†’
   342â†’        åŸºäºé…ç½®çš„åˆå†²è§„åˆ™è®¡ç®—
   343â†’        """
   344â†’        score = 0.0
   345â†’        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
   346â†’            day_master,
   347â†’            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
   348â†’        )
   349â†’        effect_scores = self._combination_rules.effect_scores
   350â†’
   351â†’        # æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å¤©å¹²å’Œåœ°æ”¯
   352â†’        stems = []
   353â†’        branches = []
   354â†’        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "day", "hour"]:
   355â†’            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   356â†’            branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   357â†’            if stem:
   358â†’                stems.append(stem)
   359â†’            if branch:
   360â†’                branches.append(branch)
   361â†’
   362â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥å¤©å¹²åˆ
   363â†’        for i, stem1 in enumerate(stems):
   364â†’            for stem2 in stems[i+1:]:
   365â†’                combo = self._combination_rules.check_stem_combination(stem1, stem2)
   366â†’                if combo:
   367â†’                    result_element = combo.get("result", "")
   368â†’                    # å¦‚æœåˆåŒ–åçš„äº”è¡Œä¸æ—¥ä¸»ç›¸åŒæˆ–ç”Ÿï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ä¸»ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰åˆ©
   369â†’                    if result_element == dm_element:
   370â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   371â†’                            "stem_combination_success", 0.3
   372â†’                        )
   373â†’                    elif self._mappings.element_generates.get(result_element) == dm_element:
   374â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   375â†’                            "stem_combination_partial", 0.15
   376â†’                        )
   377â†’
   378â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥åœ°æ”¯å…­å†²
   379â†’        for i, branch1 in enumerate(branches):
   380â†’            for branch2 in branches[i+1:]:
   381â†’                clash = self._combination_rules.check_branch_clash(branch1, branch2)
   382â†’                if clash:
   383â†’                    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å†²åˆ°æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹
   384â†’                    branch1_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch1, [])
   385â†’                    branch2_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch2, [])
   386â†’
   387â†’                    # å¦‚æœå†²åˆ°æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼Œå‡åˆ†æ›´å¤š
   388â†’                    has_root = False
   389â†’                    for hidden in branch1_hidden + branch2_hidden:
   390â†’                        if self._mappings.stem_elements.get(hidden) == dm_element:
   391â†’                            has_root = True
   392â†’                            break
   393â†’

   364â†’```python
   365â†’class DayMasterStrength(Enum):
   366â†’    """æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§"""
   367â†’    EXTREMELY_STRONG = "ææ—º"  # å¾—ä»¤å¾—åœ°å¾—åŠ¿ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³„è€—
   368â†’    STRONG = "åæ—º"            # æœ‰æ ¹æœ‰æ°”ï¼Œå–œæ³„è€—
   369â†’    BALANCED = "ä¸­å’Œ"          # èº«æ—ºå¼±å¹³è¡¡ï¼Œå–œé¡ºåŠ¿
   370â†’    WEAK = "åå¼±"              # æ— æ ¹å°‘æ°”ï¼Œå–œç”Ÿæ‰¶
   371â†’    EXTREMELY_WEAK = "æå¼±"    # ä»æ ¼æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œéœ€ç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†
   372â†’
   373â†’def calculate_day_master_strength(bazi: BaziChart) -> tuple[DayMasterStrength, float]:
   374â†’    """
   375â†’    è®¡ç®—æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±
   376â†’
   377â†’    Returns:
   378â†’        (å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§, å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•° -1.0 åˆ° 1.0)
   379â†’    """
   380â†’    score = 0.0
   381â†’
   382â†’    # 1. å¾—ä»¤åˆ¤æ–­ (æœˆæ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„å½±å“) - æƒé‡40%
   383â†’    seasonal_factor = get_seasonal_strength(bazi.day_master, bazi.month_branch)
   384â†’    score += seasonal_factor * 0.4
   385â†’
   386â†’    # 2. å¾—åœ°åˆ¤æ–­ (å››æ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”) - æƒé‡30%
   387â†’    root_factor = calculate_root_strength(bazi.day_master, bazi.branches)
   388â†’    score += root_factor * 0.3
   389â†’
   390â†’    # 3. å¾—åŠ¿åˆ¤æ–­ (å¤©å¹²é€å‡ºçš„å¸®æ‰¶) - æƒé‡20%
   391â†’    support_factor = calculate_stem_support(bazi.day_master, bazi.stems)
   392â†’    score += support_factor * 0.2
   393â†’
   394â†’    # 4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£ (å¹²æ”¯åˆåŒ–ã€åœ°æ”¯å†²åˆ) - æƒé‡10%
   395â†’    combination_factor = calculate_combination_effect(bazi)
   396â†’    score += combination_factor * 0.1
   397â†’
   398â†’    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç­‰çº§
   399â†’    if score >= 0.6:
   400â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_STRONG, score)
   401â†’    elif score >= 0.2:
   402â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.STRONG, score)
   403â†’    elif score >= -0.2:
   404â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.BALANCED, score)
   405â†’    elif score >= -0.6:
   406â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.WEAK, score)
   407â†’    else:
   408â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_WEAK, score)
   409â†’```

   493â†’def apply_strength_modifier(archetype_scores, strength_score):
   494â†’    """

   496â†’

   507â†’    if strength_score > 0:  # èº«æ—º

   844â†’```python
   845â†’class FusionStrategy:
   846â†’    """å…«å­—ä¸»å¯¼çš„ä¸œè¥¿æ–¹èåˆç­–ç•¥"""
   847â†’
   848â†’    # åŸºç¡€æƒé‡ï¼šå…«å­—70%ï¼Œæ˜Ÿåº§30%
   849â†’    BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT = 0.70
   850â†’    BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT = 0.30
   851â†’
   852â†’    # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€åŸå‹æ—¶
   853â†’    CONSISTENCY_BONUS = 0.15
   854â†’
   855â†’    # å†²çªå¤„ç†ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘å¯¹ç«‹åŸå‹æ—¶
   856â†’    CONFLICT_PENALTY = 0.10

   858â†’def calculate_fused_archetype(bazi_result, zodiac_result):
   859â†’    """
   860â†’    èåˆè®¡ç®—æœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹
   861â†’
   862â†’    ç­–ç•¥ï¼š
   863â†’    1. å…«å­—å†³å®šCoreåŸå‹ï¼ˆä¸»åŸå‹ï¼‰
   864â†’    2. æ˜Ÿåº§è°ƒæ•´è¡¨è¾¾å±‚æ¬¡ï¼ˆInner/Outerï¼‰
   865â†’    3. ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¢å¼ºç½®ä¿¡åº¦
   866â†’    4. å†²çªæ—¶å…«å­—ä¼˜å…ˆ
   867â†’    """
   868â†’
   869â†’    # Step 1: è·å–å…«å­—ä¸»åŸå‹
   870â†’    bazi_primary = bazi_result["primary"]
   871â†’
   872â†’    # Step 2: è·å–æ˜Ÿåº§ä¸»åŸå‹
   873â†’    zodiac_primary = zodiac_result["primary"]
   874â†’
   875â†’    # Step 3: ä¸€è‡´æ€§æ£€æŸ¥
   876â†’    consistency_type = check_consistency(bazi_primary, zodiac_primary)
   877â†’
   878â†’    # Step 4: èåˆè®¡ç®—
   879â†’    fused_scores = {}
   880â†’    for archetype in ALL_ARCHETYPES:
   881â†’        base_score = (
   882â†’            bazi_result["scores"].get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT +
   883â†’            zodiac_result["scores"].get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT
   884â†’        )
   885â†’
   886â†’        # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±
   887â†’        if archetype == bazi_primary and archetype == zodiac_primary:
   888â†’            base_score += FusionStrategy.CONSISTENCY_BONUS
   889â†’
   890â†’        fused_scores[archetype] = base_score
   891â†’
   892â†’    # Step 5: ç¡®å®šæœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹
   893â†’    primary_archetype = max(fused_scores, key=fused_scores.get)
   894â†’
   895â†’    # Step 6: ç¡®å®šå‰¯åŸå‹ï¼ˆæ’é™¤ä¸»åŸå‹åçš„æœ€é«˜åˆ†ï¼‰
   896â†’    secondary_scores = {k: v for k, v in fused_scores.items() if k != primary_archetype}
   897â†’    secondary_archetype = max(secondary_scores, key=secondary_scores.get)
   898â†’
   899â†’    # Step 7: è®¡ç®—ç½®ä¿¡åº¦
   900â†’    confidence = calculate_confidence(
   901â†’        fused_scores[primary_archetype],
   902â†’        fused_scores[secondary_archetype],
   903â†’        consistency_type

   905â†’
   906â†’    # Step 8: ç”Ÿæˆè§£é‡Š
   907â†’    explanation = generate_explanation(
   908â†’        primary_archetype, secondary_archetype,
   909â†’        bazi_primary, zodiac_primary,
   910â†’        consistency_type,
   911â†’        bazi_result["explanation"],
   912â†’        zodiac_result["explanations"]
   913â†’    )
   914â†’
   915â†’    return {
   916â†’        "primary_archetype": primary_archetype,
   917â†’        "secondary_archetype": secondary_archetype,
   918â†’        "all_scores": fused_scores,
   919â†’        "confidence": confidence,
   920â†’        "consistency_type": consistency_type,
   921â†’        "explanation": explanation,

   926â†’def check_consistency(bazi_archetype, zodiac_archetype):
   927â†’    """æ£€æŸ¥å…«å­—å’Œæ˜Ÿåº§åŸå‹çš„ä¸€è‡´æ€§"""
   928â†’
   929â†’    if bazi_archetype == zodiac_archetype:
   930â†’        return "perfect_match"  # å®Œç¾ä¸€è‡´
   931â†’
   932â†’    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹å¯¹ç«‹å…³ç³»
   933â†’    OPPOSING_PAIRS = [
   934â†’        ("Ruler", "Outlaw"),

   936â†’        ("Sage", "Jester"),

   943â†’
   944â†’    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹ç›¸è¿‘å…³ç³»
   945â†’    SIMILAR_GROUPS = [
   946â†’        {"Ruler", "Hero", "Magician"},
   947â†’        {"Sage", "Caregiver", "Regular"},
   948â†’        {"Creator", "Explorer", "Outlaw"},

   950â†’    ]

  1030â†’```python
